column2: Still alert and fast reflexes, pulsating body, tumor primarily on mid back
DCT-TVA; Braf; ink/arf f/f; pten f/f
Brain, lungs, heart, liver, kidneys, primary tumor
Tumor primarily grew on its mid back. Skull was in tact. Heart and lungs looked healthy. 2 pieces of tumor were frozen down. 1 primary cell line started.
